properties.displayName: _CSGP: SSPR - Sensitive account performed self service password reset
properties.description:
This analytic identifies when a potentially privileged account has been subject of self service password reset. 

Handling Guidance: Handlers should validate that this activity was performed by the user.

alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: SSPR - Sensitive account ({{AccountUPN}}) performed self-service password reset
